item.title: How We Built Our Own Time-Tracking Algorithm for a Rust app
item.description: In 2021, I was working on a start-up that was building a desktop app. At one point, an investor asked us how much time users were spending in the app daily.

item.title: My journey to Growth Lead
item.description: In the summer of 2020, I joined a startup as its first software engineer. Today, I am head of its growth team.

item.title: Reviews of selected films from the New York Film Festival 2021
item.description: In September 2021, I attended the New York Film Festival. There, I watched Joel Coen‚Äôs Tragedy of Macbeth, Joachim Trier‚Äôs The Worst Person in the World, Joan Campion‚Äôs The Power of the Dog, Rebecca Hall‚Äôs Passing, and Celine Sciamma‚Äôs Petite Maman.

item.description: I‚Äôm embarrassed to share this: Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) films are some of the most intellectually engaging films to me.

item.title: The film club no one's heard of
item.description: I attend several film club meetings a week. There, my fellow members and I share our initial reactions, reconstruct the auteur‚Äôs message, and return to the film to re-savor missed details and symbols.

item.title: The Arrival of the Media-Literate Citizen
item.description: Arrival (2016) stars expert linguist Louise Banks (Amy Adams) as she struggles to decode the language of aliens which have mysteriously arrived on Earth It may be tempting to think Arrival (2016) is only about linguistic communication.
I learned how to draw and paint during the quarantine season of 2020. My favorite drawing channel is Art of Wei, and my favorite painting channel is Mark Carder's DrawMixPaint.
Investments I‚Äôve been grateful to be invited to work with these companies as an advisor and/or investor.
Pillnotes: I co-founded a startup to build a shared decision making doctor-patient communication app.
